stack.post:
if [ -f /tmp/security/cluster-cert.key ] then mv /tmp/security/cluster-cert.key /mnt/sysimage/etc/security/ chmod 0400 /mnt/sysimage/etc/security/cluster-cert.key
mv /tmp/security/cluster-cert.crt /mnt/sysimage/etc/security/ chmod 0444 /mnt/sysimage/etc/security/cluster-cert.crt
mv /tmp/security/cluster-ca.crt /mnt/sysimage/etc/security/ chmod 0444 /mnt/sysimage/etc/security/cluster-ca.crt fi
